package.name: TYPO3CMS
package.description: This package contains a selection of sniffs which implements the Coding Guidelines for the Version 4 of TYPO3. Additionally you must install the pear.typo3.org/TYPO3SniffPool package.
package.notes: - #41260: [BUGFIX] Standards was installed in wrong dir
